Component.label: Parameter Collector

SubComponent.Description: A input/output parameter of the collector.

Component.Description: The Parameter Collector Component is available starting from the WebRatio 5.1 version. It's an operation, which means that it can be placed in every View (Site View, Module Definitions, Action Definitions, Service View). It permits to collect a set of parameters coming from multiple sources and to redistribute them to multiple targets. Its main purpose is to reduce the usage of passing parameters in order to transport parameters from multiple content components of a source page into one or more target components.
Component.InputDescription: One of the collector parameters passing through the component.
Component.OutputDescription: One of the collector parameters passing through the component.
